notable_changes.1: Added a new UI for inventories
notable_changes.4: Temporarily removed the Statistics section from Kingdom Commands
notable_changes.5: Added joined_on function. Simply creates and updates their profile
notable_changes.7: Made !bal and !inventory not require kingdom roles

changelogs.v0.2:
@Thorny#3781 v0.2 is up and running!

**Features**:
- `!c` and `!dc` commands. You can also use `!link` and `!unlink` if you want.
- Make the bot remind you when YOU want, simply use `!c 2h` for it to remind you in 2 hours!
- See your activity using the `!activity [month]` command. See it for july and august!
- Scream at Thorny in #🍪┃playground using `!scream` and see what happens.
changelogs.v1.0:
@Thorny#3781 has been updated to v1.0!

**What's New?**
- Updated !c and !dc commands
- Added the Gateway commands to thorny
- Added a !profile command
- Added a !leaderboard command

**Known Issues**
Activity will no longer be viewable for August or July. There is **no** fix for that.

Current September activity has been imported, but you must first do !c for it to register and show up in the leaderboard!
changelogs.v1.1:
@Thorny#3781 has been updated to v1.1!

**What's New?**
- Thorny is now the main Bank Bot! Use !pay and !bal, just like with the old one.
- There is a new !leaderboard! Use !leaderboard nugs to see!

**Known Issues**
Kingdom funds and personal funds are not yet separated.
The !lb nugs command does not work, as the message is too long.

**Bank Bot**
The bank will take me a while to transfer everyone's nugs, so please be patient. Could take up to an hour.
Within this time, please do NOT use any bank commands!

Update: You can use the bank now.
changelogs.v1.1.1:
@Thorny#3781 has been updated to v1.1.1!

**What’s New?**
The !treasury command!

Donate to your kingdom using !treasury store amount, and help your kingdom grow!

Rulers can take from the treasury, using !treasury take amount

Search through all kingdom treasuries using !treasury search, OR if you find it easier, !leaderboard treasury!

**Known Issues**
!lb nugs is still broken, will be fixed soon.
changelogs.v1.1.2:
@Thorny#3781 is now on v1.1.2

**New Features**:
- Complete overhaul of the Leaderboards, for technical reasons.
- Use !leaderboard to see the leaderboards, then use those commands 
- !activity, !nugs, !treasuries are all new!
- Rulers can use !tpay to pay straight from their treasury!

**Fixes:**
- Nugs leaderboards now work properly!
changelogs.v1.2:
@Thorny#3781 is on **v1.2**

**Anything New this time???**
Yes, actually. Though it's all mostly been disabled since it doesn't work as well as I'd like it to :((

What IS there, is a new `!treasury spend` command. This lets you spend money straight from your treasury, without having to use `!treasury take first`! Work just like the `!pay` command.

**Fixes?**
WOOOOOOOOOO the activity leaderboard is back!
Use `!leaderboard activity` to access it. This goes for ALL leaderboards too!

**There's too many commands? How do i remember them all???**
Simple. Use `!help`. It's in very early stages, but it's good enough!

changelogs.v1.3:
@Thorny#3781 is on v1.3!

**OOOO 1.3? What do we have here?**
- Activity Command has been improved, and is now *millisecond accurate*, not like it matters all that much.
- The Activity Leaderboard now shows minutes too!
- Check out the profile command using `!profile`. It's in early stages as of now, so expect changes and bugs!
- Edit your Bio, Slogan and more using `!profile edit`. Reminder that it is in early stages!

**Bugs have been SQUISHED**
- Activity now properly calculates your time, and won't add an hour to your time if you connected at 1:50 and disconnected at 2:05
- That's really it lmao

**Known Issues:**
- Your profile won't load until you use !c or !dc
- Activity for september is not viewable (fix incoming!)
- `!profile edit` only works for Slogans (idk why lmao)
changelogs.v1.4:
@Thorny#3781 is updated to v1.4, Finally!

**What's New Scooby-Doo?**
*RIKE ROTS OF RHINGS RAGGY!*
- New `!profile` command. Show off who you are to everyone, and see other's profiles!
- It shows your recent activity (give it a few days), your kingdom, town, and anything else YOU want!
- To customize your Profile, use either `!profile edit` or `!profile hide` or `!profile show`
- The new help command is in the process of being made! It's not much, but it shows you all the commands!
- You can now **access** the activity leaderboards from **AUGUST** and **JULY**!!! YAY!!!!
- Lots of internal changes, making thorny even easier to update in the future!

**Bug Fixes**
- You can now pay people once more

**Known Issues**
- Birthday command doesn’t work to set birthdays
changelogs.v1.4.1:
**Thorny is awake** - v1.4.1

**What's New?**
- New UI Changes, everything should look cleaner and simpler!
- New "Gamertag" Section to your profiles! Update it!
- New !profile help command
- The !help command is getting more helpful!
- New !online command shows players that are connected
- New !birthday command allows you to set your birthday!

**Bugs?**
- None, i tried to fix the bot, not break it... DUH!
changelogs.v1.4.2:
**Thorny is in Cere!** - v1.4.2

`What's new?`
-> New !kingdom commands! Five unique commands, all made for kingdoms!
-> Rulers can edit their kingdom command, similarly to the `profile edit` command. Simply use `!kedit <field> <text...>`.

`Help Commands`
-> Last update, help commands were added! They are easy to use, but are still a WIP.
-> Use them like `!help [command] [subcommand]`

**REMEMBER! [these brackets] show optional things, and <these ones> show required things to add to the command**

`Known Issues`
- Help command doesn't work. Reason: Too large of a message :((
- Kingdom will only show up on the profile after the second time you run the command
changelogs.v1.4.3:
**The Helpful Update!** - v1.4.3

**What's New?**
- The Thorny Help Center is here! Use `!help` to access it, and get help on all things Thorny :))
- Use `!help [command]` and you can see help on individual commands, and any related commands!
- Use `!help [Category]` and you can see all the commands in a given category (Capitalize the category)

- Thorny will now periodically send `tips` in noticeboard, to help you learn all the commands! (Coming Soon...)
- Use `!tip` to get a random tip sent in chat
- Use `!tip [number]` to see a specific tip

**Issues**
- Inventory command doesn’t work
- Profile command doesn’t show your kingdom
changelogs.v1.5:
**Thorny is in Coldharber!** - v1.5

**Issue Fixes**
- Using `!bal` or `!inv` will work, even if you don't have a kingdom!
- `!inv` works properly now and you can access it normally!
- `!lb treasuries` has been renamed to `!lb treasury` to make it easier!
- The **Gateway** Category of commands is now called **Information**
- The statistics section of Kingdom Commands is temporarily removed
- When someone new joins, their profile is created and the date is put on their profile!

**Gateway is leaving**
The `!gateway` command served us well, but it's purpose: Unifying all information and acting as a command center has been replaced with `!help`. For this reason, the gateway command will begin to be phased out slowly. Was a great time having you!
- `!gateway 1` has been replaced with a new, updated `!new` command. Check it out!

**Inventory**
- The inventory has gotten a complete overhaul!
- There are now 9 slots instead of 6, and it looks much sleeker than before, showing your balance!
- Soon, `!bal` will also show your first 3 slots of inventory items!

**Store and Scratch Tickets**
- Use `!store` to see all the items in the store!
- There is a new Scratch Ticket system, test your luck! Use `!lottery` to see all prizes available!
- Use `!store buy <item>` to buy a ticket, and then use `!redeem <item>` to use it!
- Nugs are added automatically!

**Misc.**
- A new `!everforms` command has been added, showing you a link to Everforms
- A few new tips have been added to `!tip`
- Thorny now feels emotion
